trans-unit.source: If you encounter errors while uploading app packages during the app submission process, you must resolve them before you can submit your app to the Store.
trans-unit.target: If you encounter errors while uploading app packages during the app submission process, you must resolve them before you can submit your app to the Store.

trans-unit.source: If you encounter errors while [uploading app packages](upload-app-packages.md) during the [app submission](app-submissions.md) process, you must resolve them before you can submit your app to the Store.
trans-unit.target: If you encounter errors while [uploading app packages](upload-app-packages.md) during the [app submission](app-submissions.md) process, you must resolve them before you can submit your app to the Store.

trans-unit.source: The error message will indicate what the problem is and what you might need to do in order to fix the issue.
trans-unit.target: The error message will indicate what the problem is and what you might need to do in order to fix the issue.

trans-unit.source: Here are a few pointers to additional info to help you resolve these errors.
trans-unit.target: Here are a few pointers to additional info to help you resolve these errors.

trans-unit.source: Package type errors for Windows Phone 8.1
trans-unit.target: Package type errors for Windows Phone 8.1

trans-unit.source: When you are updating apps that were previously published for Windows Phone 8.1, you may encounter errors related to package types.
trans-unit.target: When you are updating apps that were previously published for Windows Phone 8.1, you may encounter errors related to package types.

trans-unit.source: For more info about package type requirements, see [Maintaining package compatibility for Windows Phone 8.1](guidance-for-app-package-management.md#maintaining-package-compatibility-for-windows-phone-8-1).
trans-unit.target: For more info about package type requirements, see [Maintaining package compatibility for Windows Phone 8.1](guidance-for-app-package-management.md#maintaining-package-compatibility-for-windows-phone-8-1).

trans-unit.source: Failure to follow these requirements will result in package upload errors that will prevent you from completing your submission.
trans-unit.target: Failure to follow these requirements will result in package upload errors that will prevent you from completing your submission.

trans-unit.source: For info about resolving errors related to version numbers and the requirements when submitting updates, see [Package version numbering](package-version-numbering.md).
trans-unit.target: For info about resolving errors related to version numbers and the requirements when submitting updates, see [Package version numbering](package-version-numbering.md).

trans-unit.source: Additionally, be aware that if your submission has more than one Windows Phone 8.1 XAP, they must have the same version number.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, be aware that if your submission has more than one Windows Phone 8.1 XAP, they must have the same version number.

trans-unit.source: **Note** For additional questions related to other error messages and help with resolving them, please visit our [forums](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=224196).
trans-unit.target: **Note** For additional questions related to other error messages and help with resolving them, please visit our [forums](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=224196).
